ai.summary: Easter Park Trail is a short, 3 km easy hike in the United Kingdom, ideal for beginners, families, and casual walkers seeking a relaxed outdoor experience. The route runs through parkland with gentle gradients and pleasant greenery, making it suitable for a quick outing or a leisurely afternoon stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly well-maintained gravel and dirt paths with gentle slopes. Expect shaded sections and grassy edges; after rain, the ground can be slightly uneven or slippery in places, so good footwear is advised.
ai.safety_notes: - Wear sturdy, close-toed shoes and watch footing on uneven or wet sections. - Check weather and daylight before you go. - Stay on marked paths and respect other park users. - Bring water and a light snack. - Carry a phone with emergency contacts and know your location. - If you have any medical conditions, carry a basic supply kit and inform someone of your plans.
recommended_gear: Sun protection (sunscreen, hat) for sunny days
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with particularly pleasant conditions in late spring to early autumn; be prepared for variable UK weather and potential mud outside dry periods.

seo.meta_description: Explore Easter Park Trail, a beginner-friendly 3 km hike in the UK. Easy terrain, parkland scenery, and gentle slopes make it perfect for families and casual walkers.
